file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-61-04-06 - TRANSMITTER BATTERY - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TRANSMITTER BATTERY - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to make sure that the permitted life of the battery installed on the Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) is not expired. B. The ELT is installed in center fuselage IV, on the right side. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ELT BATTERY EXPIRATION DATE - GEN- ALL 25-61-04-200-801-A ERAL VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-61-04 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-04-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ELT BATTERY EXPIRATION DATE - GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to make sure that the ELT battery service life is not expired. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-61-04-900-801-A/200 ELT BATTERY - REPLACEMENT C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 262 Center fuselage IV, on the right side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Toilet right upper side I. Preparation (Figure 601) (Figure 602) (Figure 603) SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the toilet speaker panel (1). (2) Remove the electrical cover (2). J. Visually Check ELT Battery Expiration Date (Figure 601) (Figure 602) (Figure 603) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) On the decal (4) attached to the ELT body (3), see the battery expiration date (month/ year). (2) If the date is expired, replace the battery ( AMM TASK 25-61-04-900-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 25-61-04 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on (Figure 601) (Figure 602) (Figure 603) SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the electrical cover (2). (2) Close the toilet speaker panel (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 25-61-04 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

All batteries to be replaced before the date mentioned opposite.
